# Laden und Aufbereiten des Datensets

```{r}
data <- read.csv("wine.csv")
fit <- lm(quality ~ fixed.acidity + volatile.acidity + citric.acid + residual.sugar + chlorides + + free.sulfur.dioxide + total.sulfur.dioxide + density + pH + sulphates + alcohol, data = data)
summary(fit)
```
